code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import Cards from"../components/Cards/Cards";import InputGroup from"../components/Filters/Category/InputGroup";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Episodes=()=>{let[id,setID]=useState(1);let[info,setInfo]=useState([]);let[results,setResults]=useState([]);let{air_date,episode,name}=info;let api="https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/episode/".concat(id);useEffect(()=>{(async function(){let data=await fetch(api).then(res=>res.json());setInfo(data);let a=await Promise.all(data.characters.map(x=>{return fetch(x).then(res=>{return res.json();});}));setResults(a);})();},[api]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"text-center mb-3",children:["Episode :"," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-primary",children:name===""?"Unkown":name})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{className:"text-center mb-4",children:["Air Date : ",air_date===""?"Unkown":air_date]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-lg-3 col-12 mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"text-center mb-4",children:"Pick Episodes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputGroup,{total:51,name:"Episode",setID:setID})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-8 col-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cards,{page:"/episodes/",results:results})})})]})]});};export default Episodes;
